players.name: Alice
memory: Charlie: "Bob is the mafioso I investigated last night."
Bob: "Bob is innocent. I have evidence that he couldn't be the mafioso."

Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Alice
